description:
Knowing when and how to use modal verbs when speaking or writing in English is a common challenge for many English learners. Get excited about learning the English modal verbs in this course with short, animated videos! This course includes PDF notesheets that later serve as reference sheets as you complete the exercises and quizzes also included in the course. Plus, use them in your English studies as handy references beyond the course!

Course instructor Nikki is a native English speaker from the USA and focuses on the modals used in her country. She will walk you through all of the exercises found in the course to make sure you know when, why and how to use the English modal verbs!
title: Modal Verbs Boot Camp: Mastering English Modals
